data.event: The 2010 Census placed the Metro population at 547,184.
In 2010, Forbes rated the Ogden-Clearfield MSA as the 6th best place to raise a family.

event.title: was established by the trapper Miles Goodyear in 1846

data.event: It was established by the trapper Miles Goodyear in 1846 about a mile west of where downtown Ogden is currently located.
In November 1847, Fort Buenaventura was purchased by the Mormon settlers for $1,950.
